TopicTitle: [STOPPED UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE] [Kopernicus] Kemesis System - The Nemesis Analogue

Articles.Content:
Hello! Have you ever felt like there weren't enough planets in KSP? Are 10+ planet packs in 1 game still not enough? Well, try a new challenge,

Kemesis

 

Kemesis, the Nemesis analogue (duh) is a K-type orange dwarf around 200 KU from Kerbol. It has a wide assortment of planets and moons.

Let's meet the planets!

Burna: really hot planet close in to Kemesis. It is near black so it is hard to spot.

Jozima: A barren, humid desert planet. It is more Kerbin-like than Duna, however, so it's not THAT bad.

Xerra: A massive savanna planet with little water and no ice caps. It is habitable and has an oxygen atmosphere, however.

Roobar: A brown gaseous planet. 80% the size and mass of Jool. 6 icy moons, 2 major and 4 minor.

Orbitalis: A binary gas giant with a debris ring around the primary. It has 2 icy moons, the views are amazing.

Iciae: A massive ice ball with several small moons. Near identical to Eeloo from Alternis Kerbol.

Ashetev: A Joker-like body on a 30 degree incline and high eccentricity.

Well, that's the planetary system.

Unlike some other star system packs, Kemesis gives off heat and solar power.

I will try to get it as close to a stock system as possible, and all the planes will be proc generated.

Well, I'll try to get a release in as soon as possible.

Edited May 29, 2016 by ibuckshot5

Seems cool.
Yeah i'll do this while making other mods, so that means this won't slow me down.

Yeah i'll do this while making other mods, so that means this won't slow me down.

Good thanks

How the dark days dev going?

Edited October 7, 2015 by daniel l.
Very well. A few errors with Wexkala, though

I wish that you kept working on your other planet packs, but good job.

I would make this star at least 6 times it's current distance, though. I want a new challenge... a true interstellar mission.
Either I'm stupid or you are, but where is the download link?

Either I'm stupid or you are, but where is the download link?

This is the add on dev section, people dont have to release mods on this subforum, this is like how a company might show off its product prior to release.

This is the add on dev section, people dont have to release mods on this subforum, this is like how a company might show off its product prior to release.

Oh, sorry. After I posted that, I started thinking about it not being released.

Unlike some other star system packs, Kemesis gives off heat and solar power.

I thought that this part was still bugged in kopernicus. How did you solve it?

I thought that this part was still bugged in kopernicus. How did you solve it?

The solution: I didn't. At least not yet.

I never really thought that a nemesis analogue would even have its own solar system. Does Kemesis have a star-like look to it (like Nim in Kerbal Galaxy 2) or a planet-like look (like the REALLY tiny brown dwarfs in Space Engine)? And are your planet textures custom or from SE?
Even if this isn't completed would you mind posting an alpha for us to look at?
What is the solar power curve you'll use? I want to make a better galaxy mod with solar power and heat. Please, give me the possible curve, or where i can find it.
